title: Chapter 147 - Double Happiness
body:
Chapter 147 - Double Happiness


Feng Xiao’s howls grew more intense, and the movements in his stomach turned almost aggressive. In less than a minute, the lower half of his body was soaked.


Er… His water broke!


(⊙ o ⊙)


Was he really going to give birth?


“B-boss, I was wrong, please save me… I’ll die from the pain.” He quivered in agony as he crawled towards Yao Si. When he finally exhausted his energy, his hands went soft and he fainted.


Everyone continued to stare on dumbfound by the sight before gradually shifting their focus to Yao Si.


She shuddered from the sudden attention. “Why are you looking at me? I don’t know anything about delivering babies!” She hurriedly turned toward Lu Chen. “Stop spacing out and carry him to the medical centre now!”


“Oh? Oh!” Lu Chen regained his cool and signaled for a few employees to join him. Together, they frantically carried the bleeding Feng Xiao to the medical clinic.


The medical standards of the Galaxy could indeed be trusted. Even after a huge blood loss, Feng Xiao was visibly better once he was sent into the surgical cabin.


Yao Si and the clueless crowd could only wait patiently for updates.


“This… What happened?” Lu Chen stood in a daze, disregarding his blood-soaked palms. “Boss, what’s wrong with Feng Xiao’s stomach? Why does he need you to save him?”


“I don’t know!” Yao Si was just as clueless as everyone else. “I used my ability on him just now while he was escaping.” Even though it was probably her ability’s fault, how could a new life be formed out of nowhere! Wasn’t such an ability too much?


“It was indeed because of your ability.” Mu Xuan frowned, then provided a resolute answer, “Similar to an explosion, your ability is able to destroy a person’s genetic makeup. It can also cause the rapid splitting of the cells, which allowed his stomach to grow so big in such a short amount of time.”


“…” F*ck, I really have the ability to impregnate others with a stare.


Wait a minute!


“Why are you guys looking at me like that?” Her lips twitched, and she howled at them, “The baby isn’t mine!”


“…”


Er, you weren’t asking whose it was?


“Mu Xuan…” She tugged onto his sleeve. “He… Is he really going to deliver a child?”


“How can delivering a baby be that easy?” Mu Xuan caressed her head reassuringly, using a sincere gaze to calm her down. “His genetic makeup was modified, which resulted in a surge of oestrogen and cell reproduction. Even if there are eggs in his body now, there is no way he could have impregnated himself. It’s probably just a huge tumor; it can’t be…”


“Waaah!”


Before he could finish his sentence, two loud cries pierced through the silence.


[Di! Congratulations, a pair of paternal twins were born! A joyous occasion indeed!]


“…” Yao Si.


“…” Mu Xuan.


“…” Lu Chen.


“…” Supervisor Yuan.


“…” The crowd.


Flips table!


(╯‵□′)╯︵┻━┻


Didn’t Mu Xuan say he wasn’t going to give birth? Wasn’t it just a tumor? How did it become twins?! Buy one get one for free?!


Mu Xuan was left speechless as well, he then turned to the surgical room’s screen to inspect the data. His face darkened with each passing second. After a few minutes, he turned the screen off, looking at her with a perplexed expression.


“What’s wrong?” Yao Si shuddered from his gaze. Is the child really mine? Don’t scare me like that!


“Something’s wrong…” His expression looked odd. He paused before selecting a suitable term, “Coincidence!”


“What do you mean?” What coincidence?


“Your ability had indeed altered his genetic makeup and allowed him to posses reproduction features.” He coughed, struggling to maintain a straight face. “This means he is practically a female now, but since there were remnants of male… cough… that… what is required for reproduction. Because of your ability, his cells multiplied rapidly, forming a pair of twins.”


“…” Could you simplify your explanation? English is fine as well!


“Which means…” He inhaled deeply before concluding. ” He really gave birth to a pair of twins.”


What? What? What? What are you saying? Why can’t I understand a thing?


“Wait a minute, let me process this.”


Mu Xuan meant that… her ability turned the rebellion’s leader Feng Xiao into a half woman with reproduction abilities. Still, he couldn’t have impregnated himself. He would have had to participate in some R-rated act with a male for something like that to happen. However, coincidentally, there was such a substance from someone else still within him, resulting in a pregnancy.


So the main point was…


A light bulb flashed Yao Si’s mind as everything connected, and her eyes went wide in shock. “Feng Xiao is a gay!”


Mu Xuan nodded.


F*ck!


Feng Xiao had to have had a rendezvous recently, and he hadn’t taken a bath afterwards, so remnants of their time were still present. This allowed the impregnation to be possible.


It was indeed a drama scene come to life!


This also emphasized… the importance of personal hygiene!


○|￣|_


More problems had surfaced!


“Supervisor Yuan…” Yao Si turned to the others who seemed more informed about the situation, but at some point, they had retreated five meters away from her. Only Mu Xuan was near her, “Why are you guys doing so far away?” There were all crammed into a corner.


F*ck, even Lu Chen is gone!


“B-boss! Do you need anything?”


Yao Si’s lips twitched. “Don’t worry, I won’t use my ability on you guys!” Besides, hers was a passive ability, so she couldn’t summon it even if she wanted. “You guys should be better acquainted with him. I wanted to ask, do any of you know the father/mother of the children?”


“This… I’m not sure either.” Supervisor Yuan stumbled back meekly as he shook his head. “Boss, beasts normally retain their beastly characteristics which explains their level S physique, but their personal life… cough… can be a little complex. Since Feng Xiao is considered an aggressor in the race, he… cough… This can be considered a trait of their race.”


“…” Understood! It means that he has many backups, and it could be anyone.


Having multiple sleeping partners could… cause lives! Two lives in this case.


“A test will have to be done to find the other parent.”


Yao Si glanced over at Feng Xiao who was still unconscious. Since everything had been set in stone, there wasn’t a need for her to get involved anymore. She passed all the proceedings over to the galactic police before turning around to leave.


The moment she stepped out of the clinic, a collective sigh came from the male crowd behind her. It was as though they had been freed.


“…” Yao Si.


o(╯□╰)o


She suddenly wanted to head back and take good at each one of them!


–


Yao Si and Mu Xuan stayed at the Ore Planet for about five days to tie up the loose ends. All the beasts that had participated in the rebellion had been brought into custody, and the moment Feng Xiao regained conscious, he was brought away as a criminal of high level danger. According to the reports, he had completely broken down and wasn’t willing to acknowledge the twins that he had born.


In order to ensure the safety of the twins, the police had sent them to the beasts planet and placed them up for adoption as orphans. No one would know of their parentage.


After multiple tests had been conducted, it was discovered that the father of the children was the poor guy that Feng Xiao had pushed in front of himself to escape.


This was indeed a shocking revelation. Even though Feng Xiao had killed him, he had used his own body to bore his children. It could be seen as a form of retribution.


After all the events, the manpower on the Ore Planet was reduced by half, forcing it into a temporary closure. As the boss, Yao Si was required to remain a few more days to inspect the new employees.


Yet ever since the news about the pregnancy had spread, she seemed to have met with an even bigger problem!
